name: One Piece Statue 1/6 Usopp (Dressrosa) Ikigai by Tsume 36cm
description:
One Piece statue of Usopp (Dressrosa) in Ikigai collection, 1/6 scale size approx.36cm. Official product in limited edition by Tsume Art.

 « What’s… going on? I see the aura… of their presence! There’s Luffy! Here I go! Super Grown-Up Great Black Kabuto! Special Long-Range Attack! Bagworm! » - Usopp

This Ikigai statue of Usopp portrays him at a pivotal moment in Dressrosa. He can’t imagine crossing the seas without Luffy and yet his friend’s survival depends now on the accuracy of his only shot! Wearing his varnished red and white striped helmet and special goggles, the Straw Hat Pirates’ sniper displays an expression of extreme concentration as he prepares the lethal shot to eradicate the Sugar threat! Guided by Viola, the sniper is seen here using all his physical and mental strength to manage to target the enemy using his black Kabuto and the special ammunition created by Kanjuro! Luffy’s fate is in his hands and although fear and stress pervade his mind, his will and determination must win the battle today! Attempting the impossible, he miraculously awakens the Kenbunshoku no Haki, aims at his target and shoots, visualizing clearly now that he is none other than the man who will save Dressrosa! 

Complete your collection with the statue of --> PERONA <--

Ultimate Edition :

1 IN 5 CHANCE TO GET ONE!

Do you like surprises? Enjoy an ultra collector one with the Ultimate Edition! A different version of the statue with one or more modifications compared to the initial Regular Edition and a print run that will not exceed 20% of the limited edition!

The Ultimate edition is a "surprise" so it is not possible to know in advance if the statue will have these potential modifications!

Here is the list of possible modifications for the ultimate editions:

  1. Mask: Character with his Mask
  2. Outfit: Different Outfit or part of the outfit worn by the character
  3. Additional Element: Additional Element added to the statue
  4. Transparency: Transparent resin part on the statue
  5. Power Up: Character surpassing himself, transcending his strengths and Power
  6. Posing: Different Posing when attacking
  7. Additional FX: Additional energy / attack / power Effect
  8. Damage: Wounds / scrapes / scars related to the character's fight
  9. Ground: Decor of the base showing differences
  10. Eyes: Different gaze
  11. Face Expression: Other Facial Expression / Emotion of the character
  12. Different FX: Different energy / attack / power Effect
  13. Additional Weapons: Additional Weapon(s) is definitively the best definition!

This product is not a toy or product for children. It is a collectors item intended for adults only.
